articles.author: Ye Xie, Carter Johnson, Anya Andrianova
articles.title: ‘Hedge America’ Trade Fuels Global Rush Into Short-Dollar Wagers - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: It turns out that all the “Sell America” angst swirling in markets earlier this year was misplaced.
articles.content:
It turns out that all the Sell America angst swirling in markets earlier this year was misplaced.
The real mantra from global investors is more like Hedge America that is, keep snapping up US stocks… [+119 chars]
